pages.title: Shortfin Mako Shark
pages.text: The shortfin mako shark ($(o); Māori: /ˈmaːko/; Isurus oxyrinchus$()), also known as the blue pointer or bonito shark, is a large mackerel shark.$(br2)It is commonly referred to as the mako shark, as is the longfin mako shark ($(o)Isurus paucus).$(br2)The shortfin mako can reach a size of 4 m ($(o)13 ft$()) in length.

pages.title: Shortfin Mako Shark
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 7 Days
